question:
Which of the following matches of places where parallel government formed during the time of the Quit India movement and their corresponding leaders are correct?
1. Ballia- Chittu Pandey
2. Tamluk- Satish Chandra Samanta
3. Satara- Nana Patil
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The parallel governments formed in many places during the time of the Quit India movement. Those places and their corresponding leaders are Ballia (1942)- Chittu Pandey, Tamluk (1942-44)- Satish Chandra Samanta, Satara (1943-45)- Nana Patil and Jharkhand under Sarayu Pandey.
